name: Klapa s Mora
description: '''Klapa s Mora''' was a [[music ensemble]] that represented [[Croatia in the Eurovision Song Contest 2013|Croatia]] in the [[Eurovision Song Contest 2013]] in [[Malmö]] with the song "[[Mižerja]]". It is a "[[Supergroup (music)|super ''klapa'']]" ensemble that includes six male ''[[klapa]]'' singers from five existing ''klapa'' groups in Croatia.
